title: Sinner's serve sparks fire... literally!
description: Jannik Sinner can turn up the heat on serve. The World No. 1 in the PIF ATP Rankings literally did so in a jaw-dropping video, showing off his fiery precision and blazing firepower to light a match standing upright in the grass. The blazing stunt has quickly caught fire on Instagram. As of 6 p.m. ET on Wednesday, the video has generated more than six million views, sparking debate over whether it is pure skill or clever and hilarious editing. Either way, it makes for must-watch viewing. View this post on Instagram A post shared by ATP Tour (@atptour) Sinner is the top seed at Wimbledon, where main-draw action begins Monday, 30 June. The 23-year-old will be seeking his fourth major crown and first at the grass-court tournament. He arrives at the All England Club with a 19-3 season record, according to the Infosys ATP Win/Loss Index. [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Jannik Sinner can turn up the heat on serve. The World No. 1 literally did so in a blazing stunt that has quickly caught fire on Instagram. Sinner is the Wimbledon top seed.

html:
Jannik Sinner

Watch the Italian light a match (with his serve!)

June 25, 2025

Jannik Sinner can turn up the heat on serve.

The World No. 1 in the PIF ATP Rankings literally did so in a jaw-dropping video, showing off his fiery precision and blazing firepower to light a match standing upright in the grass.

The blazing stunt has quickly caught fire on Instagram. As of 6 p.m. ET on Wednesday, the video has generated more than six million views, sparking debate over whether it is pure skill or clever and hilarious editing. Either way, it makes for must-watch viewing.

Sinner is the top seed at Wimbledon, where main-draw action begins Monday, 30 June. The 23-year-old will be seeking his fourth major crown and first at the grass-court tournament. He arrives at the All England Club with a 19-3 season record, according to the Infosys ATP Win/Loss Index.
